metadata.description: Compatibility ratings and relationship dynamics between patterns

compatibility_principles.primary_predictor: Shared secondary styles (especially I or S) predict compatibility better than primary styles

diagonal_pairs.characteristics: Most complementary but require most adaptation. High growth potential with high friction floor.

adjacent_pairs.description: Share one axis (D-I, I-S, S-C, C-D)
adjacent_pairs.characteristics: Smoothest daily dynamics with moderate complementarity.

same_quadrant.description: Both from same family (D+D, I+I, S+S, C+C)
same_quadrant.characteristics: Immediate understanding but amplify shared weaknesses.

compatibility_principles.key_insight: Blended patterns (D/I, S/I, C/S) are more universally compatible than pure styles because they have more natural flex

Developer_Specialist.summary: Classic opposite pairing. Developer makes decisions; Specialist follows through reliably.
strengths: Specialist's loyalty satisfies Developer's need for reliable partner
Complementary strengths in decision-making and execution
Developer_Specialist.critical_risk: Developer becomes domineering while Specialist grows resentful silently until catastrophic breaking point
success_keys: Developer must ask rather than demand
Specialist must speak up before resentment builds

Developer_Counselor.summary: Maximum diagonal contrast. Developer forceful and fears loss of control; Counselor warm and fears causing stress.
Developer_Counselor.critical_risk: Developer may devastate Counselor's sensitive spirit; Counselor becomes doormat

Promoter_ObjectiveThinker.summary: Social butterfly meets deep thinker. Promoter brings levity; C brings structure.
strengths: Promoter brings optimism C desperately needs
Promoter_ObjectiveThinker.critical_risk: Promoter exhausts C's social energy; C's reserve makes I feel rejected

Inspirational_Specialist.summary: Inspirational's I-component provides warmth that pure D lacks.

Creative_Counselor.summary: True diagonal opposites on BOTH axes - maximum stretch pairing.
Creative_Counselor.critical_risk: Creative's cold, aloof quality can devastate sensitive Counselor. Requires most conscious adaptation of any pairing.
success_keys: Both need high commitment to growth

ResultsOriented_Agent.summary: Shared I component is major bridge creating mutual warmth.
ResultsOriented_Agent.critical_risk: Pace differential (fast D/I vs moderate S/I)
success_keys: Leverage shared I for emotional connection

Persuader_Investigator.summary: Shared D component provides common ground around drive and results.
strengths: Persuader's social skills complement Investigator's analytical depth
Persuader_Investigator.critical_risk: Investigator's need for privacy may feel intrusive to socially energetic Persuader
success_keys: Find balance between social time and alone time

primary_needs: A partner who sees their vision

most_compatible.reason: Shared I warmth bridges D/S divide; natural leader-supporter dynamic
Shared I creates emotional bridge; complementary drive + stability
Persuasion (not domination) works with S; warmth manages pace differences
Shared S creates common ground in patience and stability
Tempered I/D energy + C/S grounding creates good balance

most_challenging.reason: Maximum opposition on both axes; fundamentally different worldviews
Power struggles; both want control; no one compromises
Pure D force vs warmth/empathy; Counselor can't voice needs
Maximum pace and energy mismatch; spontaneity vs structure
Both task-focused and questioning; cold and competitive; no emotional warmth

I_patterns_must_learn: Managing enthusiasm to avoid overwhelming others
